entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
